name: 70s Fancy Dress
description: Tips and ideas on running 70s parties
overview:
70-fancydress is site focused on the nostalgia of the 70s which includes music and fashion influences of the time. So it offers stories and background on various groups such as Abba and the Bee Gees and the effect those groups had on dress and fashion.

It also discusses how even today, many of these designs can be see both on the high street and also in party and costumes shops for those seeking to recreate the times, or perhaps thinking of holding a 70s party.

There are interesting articles on the arrival of PVC boots for the first time, inspired by Nancy Sinatra’s recording of “These boots were made for walking”. These were a big hit at the time and have since become iconic. Before the 70s, boots were used on farms or wearing on rainy days. After their appearance on the catwalks, they have remained a firm fashion favorite.
